name: fullstack-monorepo
description: Fullstack monorepo with NestJS and Angular

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && ng serve" "cd backend && npm run start:dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && ng build --configuration production && cd ../backend && rm -rf dist && npm run build
scripts.emulate: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check-paths && firebase emulators:start
